Activity: Log in to the EHR system. Check for any updates or messages from @clinlead-1 regarding influenza protocols.
Assess patients for influenza symptoms. Focus on elderly and high-risk patients first.
Administer vaccinations. Document all details in the EHR, including lot numbers and patient reactions.
Attend a brief meeting with @pchmp-1 to discuss any challenges in patient assessments or EHR documentation.
Continue patient assessments and vaccinations. Ensure all EHR entries are double-checked.
Organize vaccination supplies and update inventory in the EHR.
